features: Manufactured by the #1 leading manufacturer of First Aid Kits in the USA. 85 pieces of comprehensive, medical grade first aid treatment products.
: Manufactured from the highest quality facility, this Kit meets United States Regulatory Standards as a Medical Device.
COMPACT HARD CASE: The rugged, sturdy, high density plastic case is impact resistant. Designed with Easy Slide Latches and internal dividers.
body.description: This new 85 piece first aid kit from Total Resources is ideal for use in the home, at the jobsite, in the car, on the sports field. This kit is compact and easy to take with you, where ever you go.This multi-purpose first aid kit includes:CLEAN• 18 alcohol prep padsTREAT• 1 instant cold compress• 2 antibiotic ointmentPROTECT• 15 adhesive bandages (3/4 in x 3 in)• 20 adhesive bandages (3/8 in x 1-1/2 in)• 1 adhesive tape roll (0.5 in x 2.5 yd)• 4 sterile gauze pads (2 in x 2 in)• 2 sterile gauze pads (4 in x 4 in)• 10 cotton tip applicators• 2 nitrile gloves• 5 butterfly closures• 4 finger splints• 1 first aid guide85 pieces of First Aid; packed in a durable compact plastic case for convenient storage and easy access.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Commitment To be the most dependable and excitingly innovative manufacturer of First Aid Kits, Emergency Preparedness Kits in all categories of Home, Office, School, Auto, Sporting Goods, Outdoors, Marine and Farm for the purpose of spreading the good news, supporting Ministries and Missionaries of all nations, in their calling and election to care for orphans, help the poor, and feed the hungry, shelter the homeless, encourage, comfort and urge everyone to live lives worthy of God Be Smart Get Prepared What started out as a small family-owned business in 1991, Total Resources International (TRI) grew to become reliable manufacturers of First Aid Kits and Emergency Preparedness Essentials in the nation. For over 29 years, we have worked hard to develop, manufacture and distribute premium products and services that provide smart, sensible solutions under the Be Smart Get Prepared brand. By embracing research, trends, practicality, functionality and innovative technology, our products address consumer needs, help secure personal and family safety, and promote overall wellness. Be Smart Get Prepared products can be found in Health & Beauty, Outdoors, Auto, Sporting Goods, and Industrial Hardware sections in mass market and specialty retail stores all over the nation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the garage
reviews.reviewText: We work on our own stuff in our garage, so for emergencies I figured it would be a good idea to grab a decently stocked kit to keep in the garage in case of cuts or injuries that need immediate attention without needing to run to the house to get everything. Perfect size and contains alot of materials!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, neat, basic first aid kit as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this purchase. Good value and as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and everyone should have one in their vehicle, boat, UTV
reviews.reviewText: These are great value and priced so that you can have them everywhere (Boat, Car, UTV, Shop etc). Has all your basic needs and a great supplemental "Just in Case" kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great kit- no refunds or returns however
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these First Aid kits for my Airbnbs and one arrived busted. Unfortunately, because it’s medical related there are no returns or exchanges for this item. Great kit, compact and useful. I’ll have to buy another one to replace the broken one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hope I don’t have to use it. Good size kit. Should be a good safety feature in the boat. Required by Ontario regulations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice to have around the house or in the car. Gloves come with the kit also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was actually way smaller than I thought. But it contained everything that was advertised. It’s really easy to fit in just about any bag because of its shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Content inside was fine. Box is damaged and doesn’t close. Zip tied shut
